import React, { Component } from 'react' import jwt_decode from 'jwt-decode' class Deneme extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', name: '', content: '', messages:'', status:'', img:'', userid: '', errors: {} } } componentDidMount() { const token = localStorage.usertoken const decoded = jwt_decode(token) this.setState({ first_name: decoded.first_name, last_name: decoded.last_name, email: decoded.email, name:decoded.name, content:decoded.content, messages:decoded.messages, status:decoded.status, img:decoded.img, userid:decoded.userid }) } render() { return (

PROFILE

Fist Name {this.state.first_name}
Last Name {this.state.last_name}
Email {this.state.email}
Name {this.state.name}
Content {this.state.Content}
Message {this.state.messages}
Status {this.state.status}
İmg {this.state.img}
) } } export default Deneme
